alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs; Western Uinta Basin; Western Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 22 at 5:14AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Duchesne County through 600 AM MDT... At 514 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Starvation Reservoir, or 8 miles northwest of Duchesne, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Duchesne, Tabiona, Starvation Reservoir, Altamont, Mountain Home, Talmage, Altonah, Moon Lake and Utahn. This includes the following highways... US Route 40 between mile markers 68 and 88. Utah Route 35 between mile markers 42 and 62. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs; Western Uinta Basin; Western Uinta Mountains
